description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes and layout of the web application. It defines light and dark theme colors, styles for various components, and responsive design rules.

classes.name: App
classes.description: A main class for the web application that sets the primary styles for the application layout.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class for styling the application logo, including animation and sizing.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application, including layout and color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for the links used in the application, with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, colors, and hover effects.
